titles.title: A resolution commemorating the centennial anniversary of the establishment of the Congressional Research Service.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
7/17/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the centennial anniversary of the establishment of the Congressional Research Service (CRS).
Commends the CRS employees for their service to Congress and the people of the United States.
